segment.source: First of all, I'd would like to say thank for you. You are reading this page and you are reading this blog, so I believe that you were able to find something interesting here.
segment.target: First of all, I'd would like to say thank for you. You are reading this page and you are reading this blog, so I believe that you were able to find something interesting here.

segment.source: My name is Mikhail and this is my blog about cybersecurity and IT. I am really obsessed with what I am doing and I want to share my knowledge with people.
segment.target: My name is Mikhail and this is my blog about cybersecurity and IT. I am really obsessed with what I am doing and I want to share my knowledge with people.

segment.source: The idea behind creating with blog was also quite interesting. I think that the best way to learn something is to start teach other people. Also, for me this blog is the opportunity to just write some code (which I also still like, despite the fact that I am not work as a developer anymore).
segment.target: The idea behind creating with blog was also quite interesting. I think that the best way to learn something is to start teach other people. Also, for me this blog is the opportunity to just write some code (which I also still like, despite the fact that I am not work as a developer anymore).

segment.source: If you find anything that I am writing about interesting, you would like to talk or you have any other reasons why you want to talk to me, I will always be glad to do so.
segment.target: If you find anything that I am writing about interesting, you would like to talk or you have any other reasons why you want to talk to me, I will always be glad to do so.
